name: Good Men Fall Too
description:
"Good Men Fall Too" is a brief, choice-based adventure story set in Great War-era London. The protagonist, Douglas Backley, is a young man  sentenced to be shot by a firing squad.  

Backley has two gifts to aid his escape: first, a  knife; and second, the ability to "see" into the lives of the people around him. How old are they? Where are they from? What have they been doing during the war? Everyone that Douglas encounters has their own life, their own story. 

It is up to you, the player, to determine what Douglas Backley is willing to do to escape his death - or whether he can stomach doing anything at all. 

Enjoy the theatre.
